title: Charming Italian Escape with Daily Spa Access and Indulgent Food & Wine Experiences
description: Discover the striking beauty, rich culture and delicious cusine of one of Italyâ€™s best-kept secrets, Umbria. Venture to the charming Perugia Provence for a five-star stay at Le Tre Vaselle Resort & Spa with a welcome soft drink on arrival, daily breakfast, a decadent multi-course dinner with a bottle of wine, an exclusive wine tasting, daily access to the blissful spa and a leisurely late check out.
